DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of Bimatoprost/Timolol Fixed Combination in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Bimatoprost/Timolol Fixed Combination in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of glaucoma or ocular hypertension in both eyes Patient requires IOPlowering drug in both eyes Uncontrolled medical conditions Contraindication to betaadrenoceptor antagonist therapy
